item.title: Looking for mods/admin spells
item.dc:creator: @itachi_uchia itachi uchia
item.description:
@itachi_uchia wrote:

[code]OK,open up something dang,forgot what it was in your server folder.Now find the spell you want to use to be admins only,and then edit it.To do this it should be this.

example: wind blast

{
else.if.spellstartswith.("WInd blast")
&& charcterrights=0
damadge:no
hit:no
disconnect player true:no;
Player disconnected=no;
}

Now,it does no damadge and character rights=0 makes it for everyone.Also it doesn’t disconnect because disconnect=no;.

Change it to:

{
else.if.spellstartswith.("Wind blast")
&& charcterrights=1 for mods,2 for admins,3 for owner.
damadge:yes,damadgemax=22,damadge lowest=0;
hit:yes.
disconnect player true:no;
Player disconnected=no;
}

So,character rights=1 makes it mods,2 for admins and 3 for owner.DO NOT PUT “for owner,etc” in there!!!
The maximum damadge it can do is 22,because damadgemax=22,the lowest it can hit is 0.It does not disconnect the player because Player disconnected=no;.
}[/code]

NOTE: THIS IS AN EXAMPLE! THIS MAY NOT WORK FOR YOU’R SERVER,ASK A BETTER PERSON TO MAKE IT WORK LIKE THAT!!!

Read full topic
